questions.title: Two Whats And A Wow: Smell
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to learn the category for today!

questions.question: What in the world are the rules of the game?

choices.answer: You select the made up WHATS?!
You select the one true WOW!

questions.question: Which of the following facts about the sense of smell is the one true WOW?

choices.answer: THE CENTER OF THE GALAXY SMELLS LIKE RASPBERRIES
SOME PEOPLE SMELL GRASS WHEN THEY SLEEP
YOUR BURPS HAVE A SIMILAR SMELL TO YOUR FAMILYâ€™S BURPS
